description: Try our easy to follow Green Beans With Almonds recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Green beans,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Green Beans With Almonds Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Add beans and cook for 6-8 minutes or until bright green and just tender. Drain and refresh in cold water.

Return to the pan with butter and season with salt and pepper. Shake pan over the heat for 2-3 minutes to reheat beans and coat with the butter. Add almonds and toss to combine. Transfer to a warmed serving dish.
